sources.title: The Stolen Dream | Full Movie | 2024 Hallmark Romance Drama | Complete Mini-Series | Antonio Meucci
sources.description:
Antonio Meucci, a young enthusiastÂ  and exuberant man, meets Ester at the theatre â€œLa Pergolaâ€ in Florence where he works, he falls in love and marries her.Because of their different political factions, they have to leave Florence and go to Cuba, where Antonio studies galvanism and makes an amazing discovery: voice can run along electrical wires. However, Antonio and Ester must leave Cuba and go to the United States: Ester falls ill, their economic situation gets worse, Antonio goes on with his experiments but with little success.In the meantime, a serious accident forces him to bed for a long time. Some dear friends support him: Antonio has the chance to get back to his experiments, creating the first telephone system in the world, from his laboratory to his bedroom, where his wife spends most of the day because of a serious rheumatoid arthritis. Antonio is no longer able to safeguard his invention and will be repeatedly cheated. He will find himself in courtÂ  having to prove he is the inventor of the telephone system, but his rival, Alexander Bell, will come off better...
2024.  Stars: Massimo Ghini, Tosca D'Aquino, Flavio Insinna
